====Usage notes====
{{l|cmn|破爛|tr=pòlàn}} often collocates with the verbs {{l|cmn|收||gather|tr=shōu}}, or {{l|cmn|撿|tr=jiǎn||pick up}}, as {{l|cmn|[[收]][[破爛]]|tr=shōu pòlàn|sc=Hani}} or {{l|cmn|[[撿]][[破爛]]|tr=jiǎn pòlàn|sc=Hani}}. One who is called a {{l|cmn|[[收]][[破爛]][[者]]|tr=shōu pòlàn zhě|sc=Hani}} or {{l|cmn|[[撿]][[破爛]][[者]]|tr=jiǎn pòlàn zhě|sc=Hani}} could be a waste picker (salvager), or merely a habitual hoarder.
